titleStmt.title: Newes from Flanders and Ostend a true declaration how the Lords States of the Vnited Prouinces, vnder the conduct of His Excellencie, haue set forth a princelike nauie of ships from Zeland, the 15. day of April 1604, which went to the island of Casant, where the foresayd Lords States haue taken in the sconce of Coxie, S. Catherine, S. Philip, and Isendiick, with other small sconces and holds / translated out of Dutch into English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Arnold Hatfield for Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Imprint date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
